<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TimeCardUIActionHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TimeCardUIActionHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TimeCardUIActionHelper = Class.create();
TimeCardUIActionHelper.prototype = {
	initialize: function(gr) {
		this.gr = gr;
	},
	
	canApprove: function() {
		return this._canDoAction();
	},
	
	canReject: function() {
		return this._canDoAction();
	},
	
	canRecall: function() {
		var timeSheetPolicy = TimeSheetPolicy.getFromUserId(this.gr.getValue('user'));
		if (!timeSheetPolicy.canBeRecalled())
			return false;
		var allowedStates = ["Processed", "Approved"];
		var hasRights = (allowedStates.indexOf(this.gr.getValue('state')) != -1) && gs.hasRole('timecard_approver');
		return hasRights;
	},
	
	canSubmit: function() {
		var allowedState = ["Pending", "Rejected", "Recalled"];
		return !this.gr.isNewRecord() && this.gr.canWrite() && (this.gr.getValue('user') == gs.getUserID() || gs.hasRole('timecard_approver')) && (allowedState.indexOf(this.gr.getValue("state")) > -1);
	},
	
	_canDoAction: function() {
		var state = this.gr.getValue('state');
		if (state != 'Submitted' || !gs.hasRole('timecard_approver'))
			return false;
		
		if (gs.hasRole('timecard_admin'))
			return true;
		
		var userId = gs.getUserID();
		var approverList = this.gr.getValue('approver_list');
		var approvedBy = this.gr.getValue('approved_by');
		if (this._checkApprovalAccess(approverList, approvedBy))
			return true;
		return false;
	},
	_checkApprovalAccess:function(approverList, approvedBy){
		var userId = gs.getUserID();
		if(JSUtil.nil(approvedBy))
			approvedBy =[];
		
		if(JSUtil.notNil(approverList)){
			if(approverList.indexOf(userId) > -1){
				if(approvedBy.indexOf(userId) < 0)
					return true;
			}
			else{
				//check for delegate access
				var g = new GlideRecord("sys_user_delegate");
				g.addQuery("delegate", userId);
				g.addQuery("user", "IN", approverList);
				g.addQuery("approvals", true);
				g.addQuery("starts", "<=", gs.daysAgo(0));
				g.addQuery("ends", ">=", gs.daysAgo(0));
				g.query();
				while( g.next() ) {
					if(approvedBy.indexOf(g.user) < 0)
						return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	type: 'TimeCardUIActionHelper'
};]]></script>
